sentence.text: ï»¿The fetus at 24th week of gestation to a 19-year-old woman was referred to us.
The ultrasound imaging revealed a biparietal diameter of 6.4 cm, an abdomen circumference of 19.22 cm and a head circumference of 22.6 cm, which were all at normal range for the gestational age.
However, the lengths of the long bones were below the fifth centile: humerus was 3.3 cm and femur was 3.5 cm.
Fetal head was dysmorphic with frontal bossing and bilateral temporal bone depressing.
Amniotic fluid, umbilical artery Doppler flow and fetal heart rate were normal.
Spine curvature and vertebral alignment were also normal.
Karyotype and FGFR3 sequencing were performed and the results were both normal.
